hook.text: You can screenshot the Mona Lisa. But does that make you the owner?

buildup.text: NFT stands for Non-Fungible Token. 'Non-fungible' means one-of-a-kind, not interchangeable.

discovery.text: An NFT is a digital certificate of ownership, stored on the blockchain forever.

twist.text: Artists can sell digital art and get paid every time it resells. Musicians sell album ownership.

climax.text: Game items, concert tickets, even tweets â€” anything digital can become an ownable NFT.

punchline.text: NFTs: proving you own something digital, even when anyone can copy it.
